sampleHymn.english: Praising Indra, the destroyer of obstacles, making all mankind Arya

rishis.name: Vishvamitra
rishis.description: Royal sage who achieved Brahmin status

sampleHymn.transliteration: tát savitúr váreṇyaṃ bhárgo devásya dhīmahi
sampleHymn.english: May we attain that excellent glory of Savitr the god

sampleHymn.sanskrit: अर्चन्ति नार्य़ो अपसो न विष्टिभिः श्रयंते पशवो न गोषु गोपतिः
sampleHymn.transliteration: árcanti nā́ryo apáso ná víṣṭibhiḥ śráyaṃte paśávo ná góṣu gópatíḥ
sampleHymn.english: The women, like diligent workers, praise (Ushas) with their hymns

rishis.name: Atri
rishis.description: One of the seven great sages

sampleHymn.sanskrit: सोमं मन्दन्ति धारया पवित्रेण सुतं हरिम्
sampleHymn.transliteration: sómaṃ mandánti dhā́rayā pavítreṇa sutáṃ hárim
sampleHymn.english: They exhilarate Soma with the sacred stream

sampleHymn.transliteration: agním īḷe puraḥ-hitam yajñásya devám ṛtvíjam
sampleHymn.english: I glorify Agni, the high priest of the sacrifice

sampleHymn.sanskrit: अयं ते अस्तु हर्यतः सोम आ वृषस्व मदः
sampleHymn.transliteration: ayáṃ te astu háryataḥ sóma ā́ vṛṣasva mádaḥ
sampleHymn.english: May this delightful Soma be yours; pour forth exhilaration
